rootCause: A long-term, coordinated cyber espionage campaign targeting a wide range of organizations.
impact: Compromised at least 71 organizations, including the UN, governments, and defense contractors, leading to the theft of large volumes of sensitive data.
description: Dubbed 'Operation Shady RAT' by McAfee, this was a multi-year campaign of cyber espionage targeting high-value organizations worldwide. The attacks, believed to originate from China, highlighted the scale and persistence of state-sponsored efforts to steal intellectual property and government secrets.
